import React, { Component } from 'react' import Divider from '@material-ui/core/Divider'; export class LoginPage extends Component { // Holds all the state variables state = { email: '', password: '' } // Constructor to bind function with state constructor(props) { super(props) this.handleLogin = this.handleLogin.bind(this) } // Handles Login handleLogin(e){ e.preventDefault(); console.log(this.state.email, this.state.password) } // Hadles change of text in textfield onChange = (e) => this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); render() { return(

); } } export default LoginPage
